check_comprehensive: Receive the DMM.com comprehensive email magazine.
terms: Please read and confirm the of Use before registering

notification.text2: Please input the Authentication code in the e_mail and complete registration.

failEmail.title: If you fail to receive an email
failEmail.content1: The email was sent to lop95huydhp@gmail.com. If this is incorrect, please register again with the correct address.
failEmail.content2: info@mail.dmm.comが受信拒否設定に含まれていないか、迷惑メールのフォルダに入っていないか、ご確認ください。
failEmail.change_setting: Confirm that emails from info@mail.dmm.com are permitted, and that the email has not been sent to your spam folder.
